From cloud migration to custom AI model development, we help you harness the power of modern technology.

cookiePolicyModal.title: Navnub Cookie Policy
cookiePolicyModal.introduction: At Navnub, a leader in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and cloud-based solutions, we are dedicated to merging creativity with advanced technology to create exceptional digital experiences. This Cookie Policy explains how Navnub ('we', 'our', 'Navnub') uses cookies and similar technologies on our website, www.navnub.com.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone, etc.) when you visit a website. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language, font size, and other display preferences) over a period, so you don’t have to keep re-entering them whenever you come back to the site or browse from one page to another.

howWeUseCookies.title: 2. How Navnub Uses Cookies?
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies for various purposes, including:
howWeUseCookies.item1: Essential site functionality: To enable navigation and basic site functions, such as access to secure areas.
howWeUseCookies.item2: Enhancing user experience: To remember your preferences and settings, making your visit more efficient and personalized.
howWeUseCookies.item3: Analytics and performance: To collect information about how visitors use our website, helping us improve its performance and design.
howWeUseCookies.item4: Targeted advertising: To deliver relevant ads based on your interests and browsing behavior.
howWeUseCookies.aiNote: Navnub leverages the power of artificial intelligence to drive personalization and predictive analysis, and this extends to how we optimize user experience through cookies.

typesOfCookies.title: 3. Types of Cookies Used by Navnub
typesOfCookies.intro: We classify cookies into the following categories:

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies (Essential)
strictlyNecessary.content: These are fundamental for our website to function correctly. They enable site navigation and use of its features, such as access to secure areas. Without these cookies, services you request, like shopping carts or e-billing, cannot be provided. They do not require user consent as they are necessary for the site's operation.

performance.title: Performance/Analytics Cookies
performance.content: These cookies collect anonymous information about how visitors use our website (e.g., which pages they visit most often, if they encounter errors). They help us understand site performance and improve user experience. For example, we may use Google Analytics cookies to understand site traffic.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.content: These allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your username, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personalized features.

advertising.title: Advertising/Targeting Cookies
advertising.content: These cookies are used to deliver ads more relevant to you and your interests. They are also used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement as well as help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. They are usually placed by advertising networks with the website operator’s permission.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: Navnub may use third-party service providers to assist us with certain site functions, such as web analytics or advertising. These third parties may also place cookies on your device through our website. We do not have control over these third-party cookies. For information on how they use cookies, we recommend reviewing the privacy and cookie policies of the respective third parties.

yourConsent.title: 5. Your Consent
yourConsent.content: By accessing and using our website, we will request your consent for the use of non-essential cookies. We implement a cookie consent banner that allows you to accept, reject, or customize your cookie preferences. To be recognized as leaders in the web development industry, standing out for our ability to merge creativity with technological innovation, transparency in data use is key.

managingPreferences.title: 6. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managingPreferences.intro: You have control over your cookie preferences. You can:
managingPreferences.item1: Adjust your consent: Through the cookie banner or the privacy settings section on our website (if available).
managingPreferences.item2: Browser settings: Most web browsers allow some control over cookies through browser settings. You can set them to notify you when a cookie is sent, allowing you to accept or reject it. You can also delete already stored cookies. However, if you disable cookies, some features of our website may not function correctly.
managingPreferences.item3: Opt-out tools: You can opt-out of targeted advertising from some ad networks through links provided by the Network Advertising Initiative (NAI) or the Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA).

dataRetention.title: 7. Cookie Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Cookies have different lifespans. Some are 'session cookies' that are automatically deleted when you close your browser, while others are 'persistent cookies' that remain on your device for a predefined period or until you manually delete them.

policyUpdates.title: 8. Updates to This Cookie Policy
policyUpdates.content: We reserve the right to update this Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated Cookie Policy on our website. We recommend reviewing this page regularly to stay informed about our cookie practices.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, you can contact us through the contact means provided on our website www.navnub.com.

termsOfServicePage.introduction: Welcome to Navnub. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of the services provided by Navnub ('we', 'our', 'Navnub'), a leading company in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) that merges technological innovation with cloud-based solutions and artificial intelligence.
termsOfServicePage.acceptanceIntro: By accessing or using any of Navnub's services, you ('User', 'Client') agree to be legally bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, you should not use our services.

section1.title: 1. Description of Services
section1.intro: Navnub specializes in creating innovative and technologically advanced solutions, with the mission to merge creativity with advanced technology to create exceptional digital experiences. Our services include, but are not limited to:

item1.title: Web Platform and Mobile Application Development
item1.content: Creation of websites and applications that are not only visually appealing but also functional and highly intuitive.

item2.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) Projects
item2.content: Implementation of AI-based solutions to drive personalization and predictive analysis, resulting in solutions that adapt and evolve alongside our clients' changing needs.

item3.title: Chatbots and Automations
item3.content: Development of high-quality chatbots for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), with integration into landing pages and compatibility with the WhatsApp Business API. These chatbots enhance customer interaction by providing instant responses to inquiries and help businesses automate repetitive tasks, resulting in greater efficiency and productivity.

item4.title: Cloud-Based Solutions
item4.content: As pioneers in the convergence of cloud and artificial intelligence, we aim to provide scalable, customized, and highly functional solutions that drive digital transformation.

section2.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
section2.content: By contracting or using Navnub's services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms, as well as our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy. These Terms constitute a binding legal agreement between you and Navnub.

section3.title: 3. User Obligations and Conduct
section3.item1: Provide truthful, complete, and updated information for the provision of services.
section3.item2: Use Navnub's services lawfully and in accordance with morality, public order, and good customs.
section3.item3: Not use the services for illegal, fraudulent, misleading purposes, or purposes that may harm the reputation of Navnub or third parties.
section3.item4: Not upload, transmit, or distribute illegal, defamatory, obscene, abusive, threatening, harmful, privacy-invasive, racially or ethnically objectionable, or otherwise objectionable content.
section3.item5: Not infringe upon the intellectual property rights of Navnub or third parties.
section3.item6: Not interfere with the security or operation of the services or other systems connected to them.
section3.item7: Be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any access credentials provided by Navnub or created by the User, and for all activities that occur under their account.

navnubContent.title: Navnub Content
navnubContent.content: All content, design, logos, trademarks, software, AI methodologies, and other intellectual property elements developed by Navnub, or for which Navnub is a licensor, are the exclusive property of Navnub or its licensors and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws.

clientContent.title: Client Content
clientContent.content: The Client shall retain intellectual property ownership of all content, data, and materials provided to Navnub for the provision of services. The Client grants Navnub a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, and distribute such content solely for the purpose of providing the contracted services. The Client warrants that they have all necessary rights and permissions to provide such content to Navnub.

specificDevelopments.title: Specific Developments
specificDevelopments.content: The intellectual property of custom developments created by Navnub for the Client (e.g., source code of a custom chatbot, design of a specific web platform) will be governed by the specific agreements of each project, detailed in the corresponding service contract.

section5.title: 5. Payments and Billing
section5.content: Payment terms, fees, deadlines, and any additional charges will be specified in the individual project proposal or service contract agreed between Navnub and the Client. The Client agrees to make payments on the stipulated dates and in the stipulated forms. Failure to make payments may result in the suspension or termination of services by Navnub.

section6.title: 6. Confidentiality
section6.content: Navnub and the Client commit to maintaining the confidentiality of all non-public information shared between the parties during the business relationship ('Confidential Information'), including, but not limited to, trade secrets, technical, operational, financial, marketing information, business strategies, and customer data. Both parties agree to use Confidential Information solely for the purposes of providing the services and not to disclose it to third parties without the prior written consent of the disclosing party. This confidentiality obligation will remain in effect during the term of this agreement and for a period of five (5) years after its termination.

section7.title: 7. Personal Data Protection
section7.content: Navnub is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of its users and clients. All processing of personal data by Navnub is governed by our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy, which are available on our website. By using our services, you consent to the processing of your personal data in accordance with said policies. Navnub commits to complying with applicable data protection laws, including, where applicable, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union, the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA/CPRA), and other relevant regulations.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
section8.content: Navnub is dedicated to excellence and constant innovation and strives to offer exceptional digital experiences. However, Navnub's services are provided 'as is' and 'as available', without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement. Navnub does not warrant that the services will be uninterrupted, error-free, secure, or that defects will be corrected. Any specific warranty regarding the performance or features of a particular service will be exclusively that established in a Service Level Agreement (SLA) attached to the individual project contract.

section9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
section9.content: In no event shall Navnub, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including, without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or intangible assets, or other intangible losses, resulting from (I) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the services; (II) any conduct or content of any third party on the services; (III) any content obtained from the services; and (IV) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence), or any other legal theory, even if we have been informed of the possibility of such damage. Navnub's total cumulative liability for any claim arising out of or related to these Terms or the services shall not, in any event, exceed the amount paid by the Client to Navnub for the services during the six (6) months prior to the date of the event giving rise to the claim.

section10.title: 10. Indemnification
section10.content: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Navnub and its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, and affiliates, from and against any and all claims, demands, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to reasonable attorneys' fees), arising from or related to: a) your use of and access to the services; b) your breach of any of these Terms; c) the content you provide or transmit through the services; d) your violation of any third-party right, including without limitation any intellectual property, privacy, or third-party right; e) your negligent or intentional misconduct.

section11.title: 11. Force Majeure
section11.content: Navnub shall not be liable for any delay or failure in the performance of its obligations under these Terms if such delay or failure is caused by events beyond its reasonable control, including, but not limited to, acts of God, war, terrorism, civil unrest, embargoes, fires, floods, earthquakes, strikes, pandemics, labor or material shortages, telecommunications interruptions, network failures, or widespread cyberattacks.

section12.title: 12. Termination
section12.content: Navnub may terminate or suspend your access to the services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the services will immediately cease. Provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination, including, without limitation, intellectual property provisions, disclaimer of warranties, limitation of liability, indemnification, and applicable law, shall remain in full force and effect.

section13.title: 13. Subcontracting
section13.content: Navnub may, at its discretion, subcontract part or all of the provision of services to qualified third parties, provided that Navnub remains primarily responsible to the Client for the fulfillment of its obligations under these Terms and individual service agreements.

section14.title: 14. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
section14.content:
These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the state of Florida, United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

Any dispute, controversy, or claim arising out of or relating to these Terms, including their validity, interpretation, performance, or termination, shall be resolved by binding arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association (AAA) in accordance with its Commercial Arbitration Rules, and the arbitration award may be entered in any court having jurisdiction over the parties. The place of arbitration shall be Doral, Florida, United States. The language of the arbitration shall be Spanish.

section15.title: 15. Changes to Terms
section15.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material (e.g., significant changes to services, fees, or user rights), we will make reasonable efforts to provide at least thirty (30) days' notice before any new terms take effect, through a notification on our website or by email. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our services after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not accept the new terms, you must stop using Navnub's services.

section16.title: 16. Severability
section16.content: If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in full force and effect.

section17.title: 17. Entire Agreement
section17.content: These Terms, together with any individual service contracts, the Privacy Policy, and the Cookie Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Navnub regarding the services and supersede any prior or contemporaneous agreements, whether oral or written, regarding such services.

section18.title: 18. Contact
section18.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, you can contact Navnub through the contact means available on our website: www.navnub.com.

finalNote.title: Important Note
finalNote.content: This document is a draft for discussion. For final implementation, it is essential that an attorney specialized in technology and commercial law review and adapt these Terms to the specific laws of all jurisdictions where Navnub operates and those of its clients, ensuring maximum legal protection for both parties and compliance with local and international regulations.

privacyPolicyPage.introduction: At Navnub, a leading company in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) that merges technological innovation with cloud-based solutions and artificial intelligence, our mission is to merge creativity with advanced technology to create exceptional digital experiences. We are dedicated to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal data. This Privacy Policy describes how Navnub ('we', 'our', 'Navnub') collects, uses, discloses, and protects the personal information you provide to us or that we collect through our website www.navnub.com and our services.

section1.title: 1. What information do we collect?
section1.intro: We collect different types of information in connection with your use of our services:

subsection1.title: Information you provide directly to us:
subsection1.item1: Contact details: Name, email address, phone number, postal address, when you register on our site, request a demo, subscribe to our newsletter, contact us, or use our chatbots.
subsection1.item2: Company data: Company name, size, industry sector, and specific details about your web development, AI, or chatbot needs.
subsection1.item3: Account credentials: Usernames and passwords (encrypted) to access our services or platforms.
subsection1.item4: Communications: Content of your communications with us, including emails, phone calls, and messages via chatbots.
subsection1.item5: Payment information: Billing and transaction details if you contract our services (securely processed by third parties).

subsection2.title: Information we collect automatically:
subsection2.item1: Usage data: Information about how you interact with our website and services, such as the pages you visit, the duration of your visit, the type of content you view, the features you use in our chatbots.
subsection2.item2: Technical device data: IP address, browser type, operating system, unique device identifiers, language settings, mobile network information, and diagnostic data.
subsection2.item3: Location data: Approximate location information derived from your IP address.
subsection2.item4: Cookies and similar technologies: As described in our Cookie Policy, we use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activity and preferences.

section2.title: 2. How do we use your information?
section2.intro: We use the information collected for the following purposes:
section2.item1: To provide and maintain our services: To operate, maintain, and improve our website and the services we offer, including the development of websites, applications, AI solutions, and chatbots.
section2.item2: To personalize your experience: We leverage the power of artificial intelligence to drive personalization and predictive analysis, resulting in solutions that adapt and evolve alongside our clients' changing needs. This includes tailoring the content and features of our services to your interests.
section2.item3: To communicate with you: To respond to your inquiries, send you information about our services, updates, security alerts, and administrative communications.
section2.item4: For marketing and advertising: To send you marketing communications about Navnub products and services that we believe may be of interest to you, in accordance with your marketing preferences.
section2.item5: For analysis and improvement: To analyze the use of our services, understand trends, measure the effectiveness of our campaigns, and improve the functionality and performance of our site and solutions.
section2.item6: To ensure security: To detect, prevent, and address fraud, abuse, malicious or illegal activities, and to protect the rights and property of Navnub and our users.
section2.item7: For legal compliance: To comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

section3.title: 3. How do we share your information?
section3.intro: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your personal information in the following circumstances:
section3.item1: With your consent: When you give us explicit permission to share your information.
section3.item2: Service providers: We share information with third-party vendors who perform services on our behalf, such as web hosting, payment processing, data analysis, marketing services, and customer support. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes for which it was provided.
section3.item3: Business partners: We may share information with business partners to offer joint services or promotions, provided you have previously consented.
section3.item4: Legal compliance and protection: We may disclose information if we believe in good faith that it is necessary to comply with a legal obligation, protect our rights or property, prevent fraud, or protect the safety of our users or the public.
section3.item5: Business transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, sale of assets, or any other business transaction involving the transfer of our company to another entity, your personal information may be transferred as part of such transaction.

section4.title: 4. Legal Bases for Data Processing (GDPR)
section4.intro: If you are a user from the European Economic Area (EEA), our legal basis for collecting and using the personal information described in this Privacy Policy will depend on the personal information concerned and the specific context in which we collect it:
section4.item1: Performance of a contract: When processing is necessary to perform a contract with you (e.g., to provide the services you have requested).
section4.item2: Consent: When you have given us your consent to do so.
section4.item3: Legitimate interests: When processing is necessary for our legitimate interests or those of a third party, and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests (e.g., to improve our services, direct marketing).
section4.item4: Legal obligation: When processing is necessary to comply with a legal obligation.

section5.title: 5. International Data Transfer
section5.content: As Navnub operates globally and uses cloud-based solutions, your personal information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside your country of residence, including the United States. We will ensure that such transfers are made in accordance with applicable data protection laws and that appropriate safeguards (e.g., standard contractual clauses, data transfer frameworks) are implemented to protect your information.

section6.title: 6. Your Data Protection Rights
section6.intro: Depending on your location and applicable privacy laws, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
section6.item1: Right of Access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
section6.item2: Right of Rectification: Request correction of any incomplete or inaccurate personal information.
section6.item3: Right to Erasure ('Right to be Forgotten'): Request the deletion of your personal information in certain circumstances.
section6.item4: Right to Restriction of Processing: Request the restriction of processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.
section6.item5: Right to Data Portability: Request the transfer of your personal information to another organization, or directly to you, in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
section6.item6: Right to Object: Object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances (e.g., for direct marketing purposes).
section6.item7: Right to Withdraw Consent: If we rely on your consent to process your personal information, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.
section6.outro: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided at the end of this Privacy Policy. We may ask you to verify your identity before responding to your request.

section7.title: 7. Data Security
section7.content: At Navnub, we transform ideas into digital realities, where every line of code and every design are testaments to our commitment to excellence and limitless innovation. We apply appropriate technical, organizational, and physical security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures include encryption, firewalls, access controls, and data security procedures. However, no data transmission over the Internet or electronic storage system can guarantee 100% security.

section8.title: 8. Data Retention
section8.content: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it, including compliance with any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. When your personal information is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

section9.title: 9. Links to Third-Party Websites
section9.content: Our website and services may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Navnub. We have no control over the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party websites and assume no responsibility for them. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of each site you visit.

section10.title: 10. Children's Privacy
section10.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you are a parent or guardian and know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from children without verification of parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information from our servers.

section11.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section11.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on our website and updating the 'Effective Date' at the top of this page. We recommend that you review this Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed about our privacy practices.

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.intro: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, you can contact Navnub through:
section12.item1: Email: [Insert privacy contact email, e.g., privacy@navnub.com]
section12.item2: Postal address: [Insert Navnub's physical address, if applicable]

legalNotice.title: IMPORTANT LEGAL NOTICE:
legalNotice.content: This document is a draft and is for informational purposes only. It does not constitute legal advice. Data protection laws are complex and vary significantly by jurisdiction. To ensure Navnub's Privacy Policy complies with all applicable regulations (including GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, etc.) and adequately protects both the company and users, it is essential that it be reviewed, adapted, and approved by an attorney specializing in privacy and data protection law before its publication and application.
